resources.string: Cov ntaub ntawv tsis muaj dab tsi

Qhov no yog lub kaw lus app, tshem tawm nws yuav ua rau lub kaw lus tsis ruaj khov.\nUa li cas?

Hloov Txaus siab rau koj hom lus
PayPal ID luam theej rau hauv daim ntawv teev lus

Yuav ua li cas nkag mus tau sib koom Windows folder ntawm Android (SMB)


Qhib Cov Ntaub Ntawv Sib Koom ntawm Windows

Qhib Control Vaj Huam Sib Luag, nyem Xaiv HomeGroup thiab sib koom kev xaiv hauv Network thiab Internet, thiab nias "Hloov Advanced Sib Koom Chaw," pab kom "Cov ntaub ntawv thiab Lub tshuab luam ntawv sib koom" feature.


Ntxiv cov ntaub ntawv sib qhia

Tej zaum koj kuj yuav xav teeb tsa lwm qhov kev sib koom siab heev ntawm no. 
 Piv txwv li, koj tuaj yeem tso cai nkag mus rau koj cov ntaub ntawv yam tsis muaj tus password yog tias koj ntseeg tag nrho cov khoom siv ntawm koj lub network hauv zos. Thaum qhib cov ntaub ntawv thiab lub tshuab luam ntawv sib koom, koj tuaj yeem ua tau qhib File Explorer lossis Windows Explorer, right-click ib daim nplaub tshev uas koj xav qhia, thiab xaiv Properties. 
 Nyem khawm Qhia thiab ua kom cov ntawv tais ceev tseg rau hauv lub network.


Xyuas kom tseeb tias ob lub cuab yeej siv tib lub Wifi

Qhov no feature ua rau cov ntaub ntawv muaj nyob rau hauv lub zos network, yog li koj lub PC thiab mobile pab kiag li lawm yuav tsum nyob rau tib lub zos network. Koj tsis tuaj yeem nkag mus rau qhov sib koom Windows nplaub tshev Hauv Is Taws Nem lossis thaum koj lub xov tooj smartphone txuas nrog nws cov ntaub ntawv mobile - nws yuav tsum txuas nrog Wi-Fi.


Nrhiav IP chaw nyob

Qhib Command Prompt. Ntaus 'ipconfig' thiab nias Enter. Saib rau Default Gateway Hauv qab koj lub network adapter rau koj tus router tus IP chaw nyob. Nrhiav \"IPv4 Chaw Nyob\" nyob rau hauv tib seem adapter mus nrhiav koj lub computer's IP chaw nyob.


Sau cov ntsiab lus hauv SMB dialog box
Tsis pub tshaj 100 cov ntaub ntawv
Xaiv lub hauv paus ntawm OTG ntaus ntawv
Qee cov ntaub ntawv tsis ua tiav %s
Koj yuav tsum luam cov ntaub ntawv no mus cia qhib nws
yuam kev: Cov ntaub ntawv loj heev
Txoj kev theej rau cov ntawv teev cia
Txoj Kev Sib Txuas Huab Cua Tshiab
Txoj kev mus rau hauv paus ntawm phau ntawv qhia
Oops, muaj ib yam dab tsi mus tsis ncaj ncees lawm!

Tsis siv neeg zais toolbar thaum scrolling
Kev hloov xim thaum swiping tabs
Tshem tawm lub plhaub sib tham sib
Kev sib txuas twb muaj lawm
Kev ua haujlwm ua tsis tiav rau cov ntaub ntawv nram qab no
Tsim tus password tus tswv rau kev encryption. Cia qhov khoob kom tshem tawm.
Siv tus ntiv tes txhawm rau txheeb xyuas qhov encryption
Kev tso cai tus ntiv tes uas ploj lawm
Tsis muaj tus ntiv tes nkag
Tsis muaj kev ruaj ntseg xauv npo pom
Tau qhia, thaum koj hloov koj tus qauv kev ruaj ntseg los ntawm Kev teeb tsa lub cev, koj yuav tsis muaj peev xwm decrypt cov ntsiab lus no.
Amaze Cloud plugin tsis pom. Thov rub tawm los ntawm Play Store.
Ua tsis tiav rau kev thauj khoom txuas. Thov qhib Amaze Cloud ib zaug.

Ntev xovxwm kab bar los ntaus ib txoj kev cai
Qhib cov ntaub ntawv ua haujlwm tshiab
Tso cai rau koj qhib cov ntaub ntawv hauv kev ua haujlwm sib cais. Nkag mus rau lawv los ntawm kev tshuaj ntsuam qhov system tsis ntev los no.
Thov nruab ib Bitcoin Wallet app
Amaze File Tus Thawj Tswj FTP Server\'s Notifications
Ua tsis tau tej ntaub ntawv. Thov xyuas koj qhov kev sib txuas.

Qhov tseeb ntawm tus tswv '%1$s' tsis tuaj yeem tsim tau.

%2$s tus ntiv tes tseem ceeb yog %3$s.

Thov coj mus rhaub "Yes" kom paub meej tus kheej; txwv tsis pub, thov coj mus rhaub "No".
Tsis tuaj yeem nyeem cov ntawv xaiv PEM: %s
Kev nkag mus tsis ua haujlwm: Tsis tuaj yeem lees paub nrog tus neeg siv lub npe thiab tus password.
Kev nkag mus tsis ua haujlwm: Tsis tuaj yeem lees paub nrog tus neeg siv lub npe thiab tus yuam sij ntiag tug.
WARNING: REMOTE HOST IDENTIFICATION tau hloov lawm!

Nws muaj peev xwm ua tau tias ib tug neeg ua qee yam tsis zoo!

Ib tug neeg tuaj yeem ua rau koj eavesdropping tam sim no (txiv neej-hauv-tus-nruab nrab tawm tsam)! Kuj tseem muaj peev xwm hais tias tus yuam sij host nyuam qhuav raug hloov. Tus ntiv tes rau pej xeem tus yuam sij xa los ntawm tus tswv tsev nyob deb tsis sib xws rau qhov khaws cia hauv Amaze.

Thov hu rau koj tus thawj tswj hwm lub cev lossis teeb tsa qhov kev sib txuas tshiab kom txuas ntxiv mus rau tus neeg rau zaub mov.
Thov sau lo lus zais tseem ceeb .
Nws tau pom zoo kom siv \.zip\" ua cov ntaub ntawv txuas ntxiv.
Cov ntaub ntawv tsim cov ntaub ntawv rau Android
Rov hais dua lo lus zais
Nws tau pom zoo kom siv \.txt\" ua cov ntaub ntawv txuas ntxiv.
Xaiv tus yuam sij rau kev lees paub
Cov nqe lus tseem ceeb tsis raug.
Tsis muaj tus txiav txim siab siv tau los decrypt PEM.
Tsis hloov tshiab encryption hauv database
Tsis muaj cov ntaub ntawv hais txog cov ntaub ntawv no
Tsis tau, thov rov qhib dua los ntawm lub xeem app
Ib yam tsis raug, tsis muaj dab tsi qhib
Cov. cov ntaub ntawv ntev dhau lawm thiab tsis tuaj yeem hloov kho, txawm li cas los xij koj tuaj yeem nyeem thawj %d cim
Cov ntaub ntawv qhib yog nyeem nkaus xwb.

AESCrypt yog qhov qhib cov ntaub ntawv encryption hom ntawv raws li AES encryption. Nws kuj yog portable, tuaj yeem decrypted nrog AESCrypt cov kev pab cuam ntawm lwm lub platform.

AESCrypt lub vev xaib

Amaze\'s Encryption Format kuj yog raws li AES encryption; tab sis txawv ntawm AESCrypt hom, nws tsuas yog decrypted los ntawm cov cuab yeej no; kuj koj yuav tsum tsis txhob uninstall Amaze File Manager los ntawm lub cuab yeej no los yog hloov txoj kev koj xauv npo, txwv tsis pub koj yuav tsis muaj txoj hauv kev rov qab tau cov ntaub ntawv encrypted.
Encrypted cov ntaub ntawv yuav tsum siv \."aze\" raws li cov ntaub ntawv extension.
Encrypted cov ntaub ntawv yuav tsum siv \."aes\" ua cov ntaub ntawv extension.
Tsis tuaj yeem sau cov ntaub ntawv ntxiv.
Cov ntaub ntawv khaws cia li \'%s\'.
Cov ntaub ntawv tsim yuav raug muab zais rau hauv daim ntawv teev npe.
App xav tau kev tso cai rau nruab cov apps txuas ntxiv.
Qee cov ntaub ntawv hauv archive tsis tuaj yeem muab rho tawm; archive tej zaum yuav puas los yog los ntawm qhov phem.
Tam sim no koj yuav mus rau Android\'s filesystem vim kev ruaj ntseg. Thov xaiv lub USB ntaus ntawv los ntawm cov npe ntawm sab laug.
Ua tsaug rau qhov pub dawb, qhov no ua rau peb mob siab rau! (:
Enable marquee effect for file npe
Tsis tuaj yeem rho tawm cov ntaub ntawv \"%s\": %s
Cannot qhib archive \"%s\". Txawm hais tias peb tsis tuaj yeem qhib cov ntaub ntawv, lossis cov ntaub ntawv tau raug puas tsuaj.

YUAV TSUM PAUB TIAS YUAV UA LI CAS YUAV UA LI CAS!

Ib tug neeg tuaj yeem tau eavesdropping rau koj tam sim no (tus txiv neej-hauv-tus-nruab nrab tawm tsam)! Nws kuj tseem muaj peev xwm hais tias tus yuam sij host nyuam qhuav hloov. rau tus yuam sij rau pej xeem xa los ntawm tus tswv tsev nyob deb tsis sib xws rau ib qho khaws cia hauv Amaze.

Koj tuaj yeem txuas ntxiv nrog kev hloov kho tus tswv ntiv tes lossis tshem tawm qhov hloov kho SSH kev twb kev txuas mus.
Qee cov ntaub ntawv ua tsis tau tejyam vim siv tsis tau kev ua haujlwm
Txuas mus rau lub network lossis qhib AP
Thov txim, qhov ntawd yuav tsum tsis txhob tshwm sim.

Thov txim, muaj ib yam dab tsi tsis ncaj ncees lawm.

Crash report the copyed to clipboard
Disable IPC signing check (Rau legacy SMBv1 servers - UNSAFE!)
Yuav rho tawm tsis tau ntaub ntawv
Tsis tuaj yeem hloov npe cov ntaub ntawv %s - %s
Xaiv daim ntawv thov sib txawv
Clear xaiv cov ntaub ntawv pib qhib apps
Siv cov npe qub rau hauv paus
Yog tias qhib tau, siv txoj hauv kev los sau cov ntaub ntawv
RAR archive \"%s\" tsis txhawb RAR v5 archive.
Koj yuav tsum rov pib FTP neeg rau zaub mov rau kev hloov pauv kom muaj txiaj ntsig.
Kev tso cai tsis lees paub
Tsis tuaj yeem rho tawm cov ntaub ntawv nkag \"%s\" rau \"%s\".
Xaiv luag thiab poob nyiam (Xav tau)
Kov thiab luag kom txav los yog luam cov ntaub ntawv
Kov thiab luag xaiv cov ntaub ntawv
Xaiv kev ua haujlwm los ua
Nco ntsoov rau lub sijhawm tom ntej
Grant SAF nkag rau FTP server

Vim qhov no yog koj thawj zaug ntawm FTP server, thiab koj siv lub device\'s internal storage as shared folder, please allow Amaze to access the storage using SAF.\n\n
Koj tsuas yog yuav tsum ua qhov no ib zaug, mus txog rau lub sijhawm tom ntej koj xaiv qhov chaw tshiab rau kev sib koom.

Txij li Android 10, Android tau txwv qee cov npe, thiab lawv yuav tsum nkag mus nrog Storage Access Framework.\n \nThov tso cai rau Amaze nkag mus rau cov npe ntawm lub system\ tus thawj tswj cov ntaub ntawv los ntawm tapping \"Allow Access\".
Enable qhov no rau kev txhawb nqa rau kev siv cov cuab yeej sab nraud cia ntawm cov tshiab Android versions

FTP server sib koom txoj hauv kev tau rov pib dua rau hauv qhov chaw cia thaum koj tab tom hloov rov qab mus rau kev siv cov ntaub ntawv qub qub. Thov xaiv txoj hauv kev tshiab uas siv cov ntawv qhia zaub mov nyob rau sab xis saum toj kawg nkaus raws li qhov tsim nyog.
FTP server sib koom txoj hauv kev tau rov pib dua rau hauv qhov chaw cia
Koj tab tom xaiv txoj hauv kev uas yuav tsum tau nkag mus hauv paus. Thov qhib lub hauv paus explorer hauv kev teeb tsa yog tias koj lub cuab yeej rooted.

Koj tab tom xaiv txoj hauv kev uas yuav tsum muaj kev nkag mus rau hauv paus, uas tso cai rau kev nyeem / sau ua haujlwm hauv tag nrho cov ntaub ntawv ntawm koj lub cuab yeej, thiab nws yog qhov txaus ntshai - kev ua yuam kev tsis ua haujlwm tuaj yeem ci koj lub cuab yeej!\n\nKoj puas paub tseeb?
yuam kev qhib URI \"%s\" rau kev nyeem ntawv.
\"%s\" yog cov ntaub ntawv tsis raug .
\"%s\" yog corrupted archive.\nMessage los ntawm extractor: \"%s\"
Cov ntaub ntawv tsis tuaj yeem qhib siv lub app no ​​
Tsim kev sib txuas hauv Google Drive™ rau kev tswj cov ntaub ntawv los ntawm hauv Amaze File Manager.
Xaiv cov npe khoom los ntawm Google Play.

Txij li Android 11 , Google thov File Managers thov kev tso cai rau cov neeg siv los tswj txhua cov ntaub ntawv ntawm lub cuab yeej. Paub meej ntawm no. 

Amaze File Manager xav tau kev tso cai no thiab. Tom qab nias "Grant" ntawm no, thov xaiv tso cai nkag mus tswj tag nrho cov ntaub ntawv xaiv ntawm lub vijtsam tom ntej. 

Kev tshem tawm qhov kev sib tham no yuav tawm ntawm lub app.
Kho lub ntsiab lus, xim thiab zoo li tus thawj tswj ntaub ntawv
Control dab tsi cov ntaub ntawv los qhia, customize lub sidebar, thiab toggle UI nyiam
Hloov tus cwj pwm xws li kev tshawb fawb siab heev thiab seb puas yuav qhib cov ntaub ntawv ua haujlwm tshiab
Cov ntaub ntawv nyuam qhuav nkag los ntawm Amaze
Cov ntaub ntawv tsis ntev los no tau tsim lossis hloov kho
Tsis tuaj yeem nrhiav txoj hauv kev qhib cov ntaub ntawv
Tsis tuaj yeem ua tiav cov ntaub ntawv thov

Koj tab tom raug xa mus rau Amaze File Utilities. Nws yog peb qhov chaw qhib app uas muaj inbuilt audio / video / duab / cov ntaub ntawv saib, tso cai rau koj los tshuaj xyuas cov ntaub ntawv tsis txaus ntseeg kom tso tseg, hloov pauv ceev siv Wifi P2P thiab ntau ntxiv.\nThov txhawb peb los ntawm kev sim nws.
Ua tsaug rau kev txhim kho Amaze File Utilities. Koj tab tom raug xa mus rau lub app.
Qhia ntes cov cav ntawm email / telegram

Rau Google Play txoj cai tswjfwm, cov apps tsis raug tso cai hloov kho nws tus kheej ntawm nws tus kheej. Thov hloov tshiab app los ntawm Google Play.
Tsis tuaj yeem tau txais cov ntaub ntawv pob los ntawm cov ntaub ntawv \"%s\". Txawm li cas los xij cov ntaub ntawv teev tseg tsis yog APK, lossis cov ntaub ntawv pob tsis raug.
Nug kom paub meej ua ntej rho tawm cov ntaub ntawv. Disabling qhov no yog kev poob siab heev!

Amaze Cloud Plugin tsis txaus siab nrog F-Droid version. Thov siv Play Store version of Amaze.
Luam cov neeg siv lub hom phiaj lim
Disables Amaze inbuilt media player los ntawm cov ntawv xaiv
Tsis pom lub app los tswj lub hom phiaj no. Koj puas tau teeb tsa DocumentsUI?
Cov ntaub ntawv pov thawj kev sib txuas huab tau tshem tawm
Hmoov tsis zoo, peb tsis tuaj yeem txav koj cov ntaub ntawv kev sib txuas huab mus rau qhov tshiab database schema, thiab peb muaj kom tshem lawv tawm ntawm lub app. Thov tsim huab sib txuas dua.
